markdown:
{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Rust |image = Portrait_Rust_Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Rust.png |caption = |race = Human |subrace = Ocean |gender = Male |culture = [Old Vailia](/oldVailia/) |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = Rogue |level = 20 |MIG = 17 |CON = 12 |DEX = 16 |PER = 14 |INT = 14 |RES = 11 |health = 253 |damage = 14-22 {{pierce}} / 21-32 {{slash}} |accuracy = 96 / 89 |penetration = 13 / 9 |deflection = 78 |fortitude = 90 |reflex = 107 |will = 87 |dr = 8 |dr crush = 6 |dr freeze = 6 |ability = [Fighting Spirit](/fightingSpiritDeadfire/), [Sneak Attack](/sneakAttackDeadfire/), [Backstab](/backstabDeadfire/), [Crippling Strike](/cripplingStrikeDeadfire/), [Escape](/escapeDeadfire/), [Dirty Fighting](/dirtyFightingDeadfire/), [Gouging Strike](/gougingStrike/), [Shadowing Beyond](/shadowingBeyondDeadfire/), [Break the Bell](/breakTheBell/), [Deep Wounds](/deepWoundsDeadfire/), [Eliminating Blow](/eliminatingBlow/), [Pierce the Bell](/pierceTheBell/), [Ring the Bell](/ringTheBell/), [Perishing Strike](/perishingStrike/), [Deathblows](/deathblowsDeadfire/), [Enduring Shadows](/enduringShadows/), [Gambit](/gambit/), [Perplexing Sap](/perplexingSap/), [Wall of Flashing Steel](/wallOfFlashingSteel/) |location = [Delver's Row](/delversRow/) |quests = [Harsh Medicine](/harshMedicine/)
[The Cornett's Call](/theCornettsCall/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Superb Leather Armor (Deadfire){{!}}Superb Leather Armor |weapon1 = Rust's Poignard |weapon1_offhand = Exceptional Sabre (Deadfire){{!}}Exceptional Sabre |internalname = NPC_SD_Legendary_Assassin |guid = 979e8759-b98a-4dba-abcc-1aaf5fc92ae8 }} '''Rust''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|He lightly traces a finger across the hilt of an emerald-encrusted stiletto hidden within the folds of a dark, leather tunic. His narrowed eyes seem to dance in the magical light as the gemstone pulses with a caustic glow.}} Rust is an assassin for hire plying his craft in the shadier corners of the Row. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [Harsh Medicine](/harshMedicine/)
[The Cornett's Call](/theCornettsCall/) |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [Harsh Medicine](/harshMedicine/): He can point you towards [Ernezzo](/ernezzo/). You can also hire his services to take out either [The Spindle Man](/theSpindleMan/) for {{cp2|600}} or Ernezzo for {{cp2|300}} (only if you have spoken to The Spindle Man about beforehand). * [The Cornett's Call](/theCornettsCall/): For {{cp2|800}}, Rust can be asked to acquire the [Cornett of Waves](/cornettOfWaves/) from [Takano](/takano/). For {{cp2|1000}}, he will do so without killing Takano. Either way, you'll have to wait a day for him to complete the task. ## Trivia * Rust is an especially high level character for his location, considering the "expected" level of the area is level 6. Other NPC's in this area are around levels 4-6. *If attacked, and (Presumably) not killed in time, he'll say "Enough!" while teleporting away with a smoke bomb, and, leave the Delver's Row with an injured walking animation. [Category:The Gullet characters](/categoryTheGulletCharacters/) [Category:Delver's Row characters](/categoryDelversRowCharacters/)

{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Rust |image = Portrait_Rust_Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Rust.png |caption = |race = Human |subrace = Ocean |gender = Male |culture = [[Old Vailia]] |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = Rogue |level = 20 |MIG = 17 |CON = 12 |DEX = 16 |PER = 14 |INT = 14 |RES = 11 |health = 253 |damage = 14-22 {{pierce}} / 21-32 {{slash}} |accuracy = 96 / 89 |penetration = 13 / 9 |deflection = 78 |fortitude = 90 |reflex = 107 |will = 87 |dr = 8 |dr crush = 6 |dr freeze = 6 |ability = [[Fighting Spirit (Deadfire)|Fighting Spirit]], [[Sneak Attack (Deadfire)|Sneak Attack]], [[Backstab (Deadfire)|Backstab]], [[Crippling Strike (Deadfire)|Crippling Strike]], [[Escape (Deadfire)|Escape]], [[Dirty Fighting (Deadfire)|Dirty Fighting]], [[Gouging Strike]], [[Shadowing Beyond (Deadfire)|Shadowing Beyond]], [[Break the Bell]], [[Deep Wounds (Deadfire)|Deep Wounds]], [[Eliminating Blow]], [[Pierce the Bell]], [[Ring the Bell]], [[Perishing Strike]], [[Deathblows (Deadfire)|Deathblows]], [[Enduring Shadows]], [[Gambit]], [[Perplexing Sap]], [[Wall of Flashing Steel]] |location = [[Delver's Row]] |quests = [[Harsh Medicine]]
[[The Cornett's Call]] |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Superb Leather Armor (Deadfire){{!}}Superb Leather Armor |weapon1 = Rust's Poignard |weapon1_offhand = Exceptional Sabre (Deadfire){{!}}Exceptional Sabre |internalname = NPC_SD_Legendary_Assassin |guid = 979e8759-b98a-4dba-abcc-1aaf5fc92ae8 }} '''Rust''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== {{Description|He lightly traces a finger across the hilt of an emerald-encrusted stiletto hidden within the folds of a dark, leather tunic. His narrowed eyes seem to dance in the magical light as the gemstone pulses with a caustic glow.}} Rust is an assassin for hire plying his craft in the shadier corners of the Row. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [[Harsh Medicine]]
[[The Cornett's Call]] |none = |other = }} ===Quests=== * [[Harsh Medicine]]: He can point you towards [[Ernezzo]]. You can also hire his services to take out either [[The Spindle Man]] for {{cp2|600}} or Ernezzo for {{cp2|300}} (only if you have spoken to The Spindle Man about beforehand). * [[The Cornett's Call]]: For {{cp2|800}}, Rust can be asked to acquire the [[Cornett of Waves]] from [[Takano]]. For {{cp2|1000}}, he will do so without killing Takano. Either way, you'll have to wait a day for him to complete the task. ==Trivia== * Rust is an especially high level character for his location, considering the "expected" level of the area is level 6. Other NPC's in this area are around levels 4-6. *If attacked, and (Presumably) not killed in time, he'll say "Enough!" while teleporting away with a smoke bomb, and, leave the Delver's Row with an injured walking animation. [[Category:The Gullet characters]] [[Category:Delver's Row characters]]
title: Rust
